birth_place.zh-cn: 大清湖南省长沙府湘潭县韶山冲
birth_place.en: Shaoshanchong, Xiangtan, Changsha, Hunan, Great Qing

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区中南海
death_place.en: Zhongnanhai, Xicheng District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事战略家、理论家和诗人，中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary, political theorist, military strategist, and poet who was the founder of the People's Republic of China, which he ruled as the chairman of the Chinese Communist Party from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state led by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，毛泽东的第二任妻子。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and the second wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，毛泽东的第三任妻子。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Communist Party and the third wife of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的第四任妻子，四人帮成员之一。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Mao Zedong's fourth wife, and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的父亲。
description.en: Father of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 1927年由毛泽东领导的，在湖南东部和江西西部发生的一次武装起义。
description.en: An armed uprising led by Mao Zedong in 1927 in eastern Hunan and western Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创建的第一个农村革命根据地。
description.en: The first rural revolutionary base area established by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事撤退和转移行动。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat and transfer operation by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长征途中召开的一次重要会议，确立了毛泽东在党和红军中的领导地位。
description.en: An important meeting held by the Chinese Communist Party during the Long March, which established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the party and the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在延安时期发动的一场政治和思想改造运动，巩固了毛泽东的领导地位。
description.en: A political and ideological rectification movement launched by the Chinese Communist Party during the Yan'an period, which consolidated Mao Zedong's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间发生的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发起的旨在利用中国巨大劳动力资源迅速实现工业化和农业集体化的社会经济运动，导致了严重的经济困难和三年大饥荒。
description.en: A socio-economic campaign initiated by Mao Zedong to rapidly industrialize and collectivize agriculture using China's vast labor resources, which led to severe economic difficulties and the Great Chinese Famine.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的中国政治运动，对中国社会造成了深远而剧烈的冲击。
description.en: A political movement in China initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound and violent impact on Chinese society.

description.zh-cn: 发生在中国的一场大规模饥荒，由大跃进等政治运动和自然灾害共同导致。
description.en: A massive famine in China caused by a combination of political movements like the Great Leap Forward and natural disasters.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义的先驱，中国共产党的创始人之一，曾帮助毛泽东在北京大学图书馆安排工作，并影响其接受马克思主义。
description.en: A pioneer of Marxism in China and a co-founder of the Chinese Communist Party, who helped Mao Zedong get a job at Peking University Library and influenced his adoption of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的创始人和早期主要领导人之一，与毛泽东的讨论深刻影响了毛泽东对马克思主义的接受。
description.en: A founder and early key leader of the Chinese Communist Party, whose discussions with Mao Zedong profoundly influenced Mao's acceptance of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家和军事家，曾任中华民国总统和中国国民党总裁，是毛泽东的主要政治对手。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China and the Kuomintang, and was Mao Zedong's main political rival.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, statesman, and theorist who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事家和政治家，中华人民共和国元帅，因在庐山会议上批评大跃进政策而被罢官。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military leader and politician, Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was purged for criticizing the Great Leap Forward policy at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会召开的一次会议，会议后期因彭德怀的批评信而转向对“反党集团”的批判，并引发了反右倾运动。
description.en: A meeting of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, which later shifted to criticizing an "anti-party clique" following Peng Dehuai's letter of criticism, triggering the Anti-Rightist deviation campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党军事家和政治家，中华人民共和国元帅，曾被定为毛泽东的接班人，后因九一三事件身亡。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military leader and politician, Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was designated as Mao Zedong's successor before dying in the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪、叶群、林立果等人乘坐三叉戟飞机在蒙古温都尔汗坠毁身亡的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event in which Lin Biao, his wife Ye Qun, and his son Lin Liguo died in a plane crash in Öndörkhaan, Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统，于1972年访华，与毛泽东会面，开启了中美关系正常化的进程。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States, who visited China in 1972, met with Mao Zedong, and initiated the process of normalizing U.S.-China relations.

nodes.id: 湖南省立第一师范学校

zh-cn: 湖南省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南长沙的一所师范学校，毛泽东曾在此就读。
description.en: A normal school located in Changsha, Hunan, where Mao Zedong studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省下辖的一个县，是毛泽东的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第一任妻子，由家庭包办婚姻。
description.en: The first wife of Mao Zedong, in an arranged marriage.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国共产党的创始人之一，并长期担任其最高领导人。
description.en: Mao Zedong was one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party and served as its paramount leader for a long time.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中国人民解放军的主要缔造者。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the main founder of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东是中华人民共和国的主要缔造者，并在开国大典上宣告其成立。
description.en: Mao Zedong was the main founder of the People's Republic of China and announced its establishment at the founding ceremony.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东出生于湖南省湘潭县韶山冲。
description.en: Mao Zedong was born in Shaoshanchong, Xiangtan County, Hunan Province.

relationships.target: 湖南省立第一师范学校

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1918年毕业于湖南省立第一师范学校。
description.en: Mao Zedong graduated from Hunan First Normal School in 1918.

description.zh-cn: 罗一秀是毛泽东的第一任妻子，为包办婚姻，于1910年病逝。
description.en: Luo Yixiu was Mao Zedong's first wife in an arranged marriage; she died of illness in 1910.

description.zh-cn: 杨开慧是毛泽东的第二任妻子，于1930年被国民党处决。
description.en: Yang Kaihui was Mao Zedong's second wife; she was executed by the Kuomintang in 1930.

description.zh-cn: 贺子珍是毛泽东的第三任妻子，两人关系于1938年破裂。
description.en: He Zizhen was Mao Zedong's third wife; their relationship ended in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 江青是毛泽东的第四任妻子，婚姻关系持续至毛泽东逝世。
description.en: Jiang Qing was Mao Zedong's fourth wife; their marriage lasted until his death.

description.zh-cn: 毛贻昌是毛泽东的父亲。
description.en: Mao Yichang was Mao Zedong's father.

description.zh-cn: 文素勤是毛泽东的母亲。
description.en: Wen Suqin was Mao Zedong's mother.

description.zh-cn: 李大钊帮助毛泽东在北京大学图书馆安排工作，并影响其接受和传播马克思列宁主义思想。
description.en: Li Dazhao helped arrange a job for Mao Zedong at the Peking University Library and influenced him to accept and spread Marxist-Leninist ideas.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1920年与陈独秀讨论马克思主义，深受启发，此后开始接受并传播马克思列宁主义。
description.en: In 1920, Mao Zedong discussed Marxism with Chen Duxiu and was deeply inspired, after which he began to accept and spread Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东领导了秋收起义。
description.en: Mao Zedong led the Autumn Harvest Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 秋收起义失败后，毛泽东率领部队前往井冈山，创建了第一个农村革命根据地。
description.en: After the failure of the Autumn Harvest Uprising, Mao Zedong led his troops to the Jinggang Mountains, where he established the first rural revolutionary base.

description.zh-cn: 遵义会议确立了毛泽东在中共中央和红军的领导地位。
description.en: The Zunyi Conference established Mao Zedong's leadership position in the CCP Central Committee and the Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发动了延安整风运动，以巩固其在党内的领导地位和统一思想。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the Yan'an Rectification Movement to consolidate his leadership within the party and unify its ideology.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东领导中国共产党在第二次国共内战中取得胜利。
description.en: Mao Zedong led the Chinese Communist Party to victory in the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东和蒋介石分别作为中国共产党和中国国民党的领导人，是长期的政治和军事对手。
description.en: Mao Zedong and Chiang Kai-shek, as the leaders of the Communist Party and the Kuomintang respectively, were long-term political and military adversaries.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发起了大跃进运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong initiated the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进的政策失误是导致三年大饥荒的主要原因之一。
description.en: The policy failures of the Great Leap Forward were one of the main causes of the Great Chinese Famine.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年的庐山会议上，毛泽东批判了彭德怀对大跃进的批评，导致彭德怀被罢官并受到政治迫害。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Mao Zedong criticized Peng Dehuai's critique of the Great Leap Forward, leading to Peng's dismissal and political persecution.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议期间，彭德怀因上书批评大跃进政策而被毛泽东定性为“右倾机会主义”，随后遭到批判和罢免。
description.en: During the Lushan Conference, Peng Dehuai was labeled a "right opportunist" by Mao Zedong for writing a letter criticizing the Great Leap Forward policies, and was subsequently criticized and dismissed.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东发动并领导了文化大革命。
description.en: Mao Zedong initiated and led the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，时任国家主席的刘少奇被打倒，并被迫害致死。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi was overthrown and persecuted to death.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在文化大革命中将刘少奇作为“党内最大的走资本主义道路的当权派”打倒。
description.en: Mao Zedong overthrew Liu Shaoqi during the Cultural Revolution, labeling him the "biggest capitalist-roader in power within the Party".

description.zh-cn: 林彪在九一三事件中出逃，坠机身亡。
description.en: Lin Biao died in a plane crash while attempting to flee in the Lin Biao incident.

description.zh-cn: 从1970年庐山会议开始，毛泽东与林彪的矛盾激化，最终导致林彪出逃的九一三事件。
description.en: Starting from the 1970 Lushan Conference, the conflict between Mao Zedong and Lin Biao intensified, ultimately leading to the Lin Biao incident where Lin attempted to flee.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在北京会见了时任美国总统尼克松，开启了中美关系正常化的进程。
description.en: Mao Zedong met with then-U.S. President Richard Nixon in Beijing, initiating the process of normalizing U.S.-China relations.
